name: Ruben OVALLES, petitioner, v. William P. BARR, Attorney General.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Ruben OVALLES, petitioner,
v.
William P. BARR, Attorney General.
attorneys: Petition for writ of certiorari in No. 18-776 granted. Petition for writ of certiorari in No. 18-1015 granted limited to Question 2 presented by the petition. The cases are consolidated, and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
casebody.head_matter:
Ruben OVALLES, petitioner,
v.
William P. BARR, Attorney General.
No. 18-1015.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 24, 2019.
Petition for writ of certiorari in No. 18-776 granted. Petition for writ of certiorari in No. 18-1015 granted limited to Question 2 presented by the petition. The cases are consolidated, and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
